channel.title: CVE Feed for Hallo Welt! GmbH -- BlueSpice
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hallo Welt! GmbH -- BlueSpice

item.title: CVE-2022-42000|2024-08-03T12:56:39.159Z -- hallo%20welt%21%20gmbh -- bluespice
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in BlueSpiceSocialProfile extension of BlueSpice allows user with comment permissions to inject arbitrary HTML into the comment section of a wikipage.

item.title: CVE-2022-41789|2024-08-03T12:49:43.793Z -- hallo%20welt%21%20gmbh -- bluespice
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in BlueSpiceDiscovery skin of BlueSpice allows logged in user with edit permissions to inject arbitrary HTML into the default page header of a wikipage.

item.title: CVE-2022-3958|2024-08-03T01:27:53.105Z -- hallo%20welt%21%20gmbh -- bluespice
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in BlueSpiceUserSidebar extension of BlueSpice allows user with regular account and edit permissions to inject arbitrary HTML into the personal menu navigation of their own and other users. This allows for targeted attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-41611|2024-08-03T12:49:43.430Z -- hallo%20welt%21%20gmbh -- bluespice
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in BlueSpiceDiscovery skin of BlueSpice allows user with admin privileges to inject arbitrary HTML into the main navigation of the application.

item.title: CVE-2022-42001|2024-08-03T12:56:39.262Z -- hallo%20welt%21%20gmbh -- bluespice
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in BlueSpiceBookshelf extension of BlueSpice allows user with regular account and edit permissions to inject arbitrary HTML into the book navigation.

item.title: CVE-2022-3893|2024-08-03T01:20:58.777Z -- hallo%20welt%21%20gmbh -- bluespice
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in BlueSpiceCustomMenu extension of BlueSpice allows user with admin permissions to inject arbitrary HTML into the custom menu navigation of the application.

item.title: CVE-2022-2511|2024-08-03T00:39:08.069Z -- hallo%20welt%21%20gmbh -- bluespice
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the "commonuserinterface" component of BlueSpice allows an attacker to inject arbitrary HTML into a page using the title parameter of the call URL.

item.title: CVE-2022-2510|2024-08-03T00:39:07.999Z -- hallo%20welt%21%20gmbh -- bluespice
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in "Extension:ExtendedSearch" of Hallo Welt! GmbH BlueSpice allows attacker to inject arbitrary HTML (XSS) on page "Special:SearchCenter", using the search term in the URL.

item.title: CVE-2022-41814|2024-08-03T12:56:37.991Z -- hallo%20welt%21%20gmbh -- bluespice
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in BlueSpiceFoundation extension of BlueSpice allows user with regular account and edit permissions to inject arbitrary HTML into the history view of a wikipage.
